public class Products : UvendiaRepository<Product>, IBaseRepository<Product>

Methods

All(String, String, Int32, Object)

Returns all the products filtered by a SQL where clause. These query aliases you can use in your 'where' clause: [Product] p [Price] price [PriceDefinition] priceDef [Definition] d [Property] prop [PropertyValue] pv
[ProductToTranslation] ptt [Translation] t

eq. where p.Published = 1

Single(String, Object)

Returns single product filtered by a SQL where clause. These query aliases you can use in your 'where' clause: [Product] p [Price] price [PriceDefinition] priceDef [Definition] d [Property] prop [PropertyValue] pv
[ProductToTranslation] ptt [Translation] t

eq. where p.Published = 1
